main event: A UFO sighting event occurred on 8 June 1963 in Dayton, Ohio, where a witness observed a bright object in the sky.
interesting points: The object was described as brighter than a 1/4 moon and appeared to flash in and out., The object had a uniform speed, resembling the movement of a satellite., The sighting lasted for about 10-15 seconds., Sighting logged as confirmed ECHO observation by military personnel., The observer also noted the object made slight altitude changes and was deemed unlikely to be an aircraft.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: The witness noted that the object was too high for typical aircraft and exhibited characteristics of a satellite.
